descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Do you like math? Many people will answer no. Math is notorious for being the bane of many students. It was a nightmare for me, too. 

What is Math Challenge AR?

Note 1: Geometry problems added !
Note 2: now with immersive mode included!

All of that led me to create Math Challenge AR. In this augmented reality game, you, at home, at school, at the beach, or wherever you want, can show the world that you can master mathematics, even if you are a bitter enemy of numbers. How? 

Very easy: by destroying numbers with your two laser weapons, numbers that move around you. All this to solve the increasingly complex problems that the system is proposing you, without rest and without a chance to breathe.

Math Challenge AR is not a substitute of the teacher. But it's a game where your mind can work with mathematics in a fun way. And that's a lot to say! Enjoy!
